settings.text: Dr. Scholl's Custom 3D Inserts made exclusively for you and the way you move.

settings.title: Custom arch support
settings.text: Firm, yet flexible inserts to support your range of motion.

settings.title: Deep stabilizing heel cup
settings.text: Stabilizing support reduces muscle fatigue and limits excess motion that can lead to injuries.

settings.title: High-performance foam
settings.text: Moisture-wicking foam tested to 150,000 cycles and personalized to your style.

settings.paragraph_text: With advanced foot scanning technology, we map the contours of your feet at over 400 points, building your Custom 3D Inserts with support unique to you.
Select the 3D Inserts based on the shoes you'd like to put them in. Then personalize the look by choosing from a wide variety of designs and colors.
After checkout, your Custom 3D Inserts are 3D printed and shipped to your doorstep within 14 days and a 30-day, money-back guarantee.

settings.text: When you tap into what makes you unique you can move and feel your best.

settings.title1: When you tap into what makes you unique you can move and feel your best.

settings.subtitle: Inserts made exclusively for you and the way you move, made with your phone!

settings.title: Custom arch support
settings.text: Firm, yet flexible inserts to support your range of motion.

settings.title: High-performance foam
settings.text: Moisture-wicking foam tested to 150,000 cycles and personalized to your style.

settings.accordion_paragraph_text: Full Length 3D Printed Inserts replace factory-made insoles that come in your shoes.

• Deep stabilizing heel cup and custom arch support based on your unique foot characteristics.
  • Firm, yet flexible inserts support your range of motion.
  • Stabilizing support reduces muscle fatigue and limits excess motion that can lead to injuries.
  • High-performance, customized fit, one of a kind inserts - all from the comfort of your home.
3/4 Length 3D Printed Inserts sit on top of the factory-made insoles that come in your shoes and are well suited for casual and everyday pursuits.

• Deep stabilizing heel cup and custom arch support based on your unique foot characteristics.
  • Firm, yet flexible inserts support your range of motion.
  • Stabilizing support reduces muscle fatigue and limits excess motion that can lead to injuries.
  • High-performance, customized fit, one of a kind inserts - all from the comfort of your home.

settings.para_text: Maximize comfort and support with Dr. Scholl's Custom 3D Inserts, made just for you.

settings.customHeadingOne: Custom created for your unique feet with Wiivv Fit Technology

settings.cardOneBody: No two feet are the same, that's why we created custom inserts with individualized support to help you move with optimum comfort and less fatigue.
settings.cardTwoBody: We rely on advanced technology that maps the contours of your unique feet at over 400 points to custom create inserts with the support you need.
settings.cardThreeBody: Your foot scans are approved by biomechanics experts then converted into a 3D model, generating unique foot contours.

settings.guaranteeHeading: From work to play, get the support you need to move your best.

settings.specBody_01:
30 Day Happiness Guarantee
If you aren't 100% satisfied with your Custom 3D Inserts, return them in 30 days for a full refund.

Manufacturer Warranty
We guarantee our insoles will last at least 1 year or we'll replace them with a brand new pair.
